ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Item_Type__c = $Setup.Field_Service_Settings__c.Item_Type_for_Consumables__c , NOT( ISBLANK( Service_Price_Per_Unit__c ) ), CASESAFEID( $User.ProfileId ) <> $Setup.Field_Service_Settings__c.System_Administrator_Profile_Id__c, NOT( ISBLANK(Item_Type__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot have Service Price on Consumables
